metadata.synopsis: Party finds Mizora in her pod in Moonrise Towers and chooses whether to release her or flush her down the tube. If alive, she flies off to wait for Wyll.
metadata.how_to_trigger: With Wyll in party, trigger Mizora's capture in Camp or at TWN  and then approach Mizora's pod in Moonrise Towers.

250.speaker: Narrator
250.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party approaches a mind flayer pod. Inside is the half-devil Mizora, Wyll's patron. She pushes her hands against the transparent cover and smiles. Next to the pod is a console with two buttons on it, the 'unleash' and 'annihilate' buttons on the console in the tutorial.NodeContext: Mizora is trapped in her pod, she pushes her hands against the cover and smiles.

206.speaker: Wyll
206.text: Sever the pact now, or I'll sever your head.
206.context: CinematicNodeContext: An infernal rune appears on the ground beneath Mizora and she sinks through it.

65.speaker: Mizora
65.text: Not going to happen - but I do like your spunk. Besides, you've got bigger fishes to fry.

40.speaker: Wyll
40.text: Fine, six months it is. What happens next?
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: An infernal rune appears on the ground beneath Mizora and she sinks through it.

62.speaker: Mizora
62.text: Well - I imagine you have business in Moonrise to take care of.

249.speaker: Wyll
249.text: So that's it? All this trouble and not a single reward?
249.context: CinematicNodeContext: An infernal rune appears on the ground beneath Mizora and she sinks through it.

109.speaker: Mizora
109.text: You've jumped through enough hoops - a little treat wouldn't hurt.
109.context: CinematicNodeContext: An infernal rune appears on the ground beneath Mizora and she sinks through it.

17.speaker: Mizora
17.text: You've jumped through enough hoops - a little treat wouldn't hurt.

138.text: My sparkling disposition will more than suffice.
138.context: CinematicNodeContext: An infernal rune appears on the ground beneath Mizora and she sinks through it.

42.speaker: Mizora
42.text: My sparkling disposition will more than suffice.
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: An infernal rune appears on the ground beneath Mizora and she sinks through it.

92.speaker: Mizora
92.text: Now - you've got business in Moonrise to take care of.
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: An infernal rune appears on the ground beneath Mizora and she sinks through it.

58.speaker: Mizora
58.text: Don't you fret, I'll find you soon enough. You're going to need me. Count on it.
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: An infernal rune appears on the ground beneath Mizora and she sinks through it.

84.speaker: Mizora
84.text: Oh - and go ahead, tell folks how we met. It's a real cracker of a tale. Ta-ta!
84.context: CinematicNodeContext: An infernal rune appears on the ground beneath Mizora and she sinks through it.

37.speaker: Narrator
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: An infernal rune appears on the ground beneath Mizora and she sinks through it.

25.speaker: Wyll
25.text: I've got half a mind to kill you where you stand.

142.speaker: Wyll
142.text: Fine, you're free. What happens next?

271.speaker: Wyll
271.text: You'd think I'd get a reward for going through all this trouble.

174.text: I'll be damned. That's the best you've got?
174.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's fist slams against the pod but it remains intact.

219.speaker: Narrator
219.text: I'll be damned. That's the best you've got?
219.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's fist slams against the pod but it remains intact.

107.speaker: Mizora
107.text: I'll be damned. That's the best you've got?

44.speaker: Wyll
44.text: Examine the device on the left.
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: The pod begins to kick into action.

91.speaker: Narrator
91.text: *You know this symbol from the mind flayer ship. It means 'annihilate'.*

211.text: *You can make no sense of the symbol.*

165.speaker: Narrator
165.text: *You can make no sense of the symbol.*

131.speaker: Wyll
131.text: Examine the device on the right.
131.context: CinematicNodeContext: The pod begins to kick into action.

120.speaker: Narrator
120.text: *You recognise the marking from the nautiloid: an illithid symbol meaning 'unleash'.*

93.speaker: Wyll
93.text: *You decipher the symbol: it's an illithid sigil meaning 'unleash'.*

38.speaker: Narrator
38.text: *You decipher the symbol: it's an illithid sigil meaning 'unleash'.*

221.speaker: Narrator
221.text: *You decipher the symbol: it's an illithid sigil meaning 'unleash'.*

282.speaker: Wyll
282.text: Connect your mind to the device on the left and activate it.
282.context: CinematicNodeContext: The pod begins to kick into action.

164.speaker: Wyll
164.text: Connect your mind to the 'annihilate' device and activate it.
164.context: CinematicNodeContext: The pod begins to kick into action.

3.context: CinematicNodeContext: The pod begins to kick into action.

226.speaker: Mizora
226.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora is about to be killed in the podNodeContext: Panicking. She is about to die.

176.speaker: Narrator
176.text: *The fires of Avernus roar within you. You are twisting, changing, shrinking. Your soul is forfeit to the Hells.*
176.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psionic surge is released. Mizora is killed (teleported to oubliette?)

244.speaker: Narrator
244.text: *The fires of Avernus roar within you. You are twisting, changing, shrinking. Your soul is forfeit to the Hells.*
244.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll sinks through the floor, flailing in agony, leaving behind a pile of ash, which can be looted to retrieve Wyll's belongings. He is gone for good.

224.speaker: Narrator
224.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll sinks through the floor, flailing in agony, leaving behind a pile of ash, which can be looted to retrieve Wyll's belongings. He is gone for good.

8.speaker: Wyll
8.text: Connect your mind to the device on the right and activate it.
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player telepathically connects to the device. Mizora falls out, then gets to her feet. She unfolds one wing, and then the other.

190.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player telepathically connects to the device. Mizora falls out, then gets to her feet. She unfolds one wing, and then the other.

198.speaker: Wyll
198.text: Connect your mind to the 'unleash' device and activate it.

262.speaker: Mizora
262.text: Don't take long, puppy. They pop a tadpole in me, and the Hells'll have you for good.

102.text: Ugh - heartbreaking. I bet you thought I'd be impressed.

163.speaker: Mizora
163.text: Ugh - heartbreaking. I bet you thought I'd be impressed.

85.speaker: Wyll
85.text: Poor thing. I'll let you out of there.

21.speaker: Wyll
21.text: Fine, let's get on with it.

188.speaker: Wyll
188.text: What have we here? Hold on - I need to relish the moment.

47.speaker: Mizora
47.text: Go on and gloat, bow to your pretend crowd.

200.speaker: Mizora
200.text: All done? Good. Now enough sniffing around and get me out of this thing.
